labels.analysis: The MCP Server primarily focuses on aggregating and delivering blockchain-related news and articles. It provides tools to fetch the latest fast news and in-depth articles in multiple languages, catering to users interested in real-time information and insights about the blockchain space. The server solves the problem of staying updated with blockchain developments in a streamlined and language-specific manner.
labels.reasoning: The primary label "News & Media" is chosen because the server's core functionality revolves around news aggregation, specifically in the blockchain domain. The secondary label "Web Search & Research" is selected because the tools facilitate gathering information from the web. The multilingual support and focus on blockchain make it a specialized news server, which could be described by the custom label "Blockchain News Aggregation".

tools.name: get_latest_news
tools.description:
Fetch the latest blockchain fast news articles up to max_pages.

    Parameters:
        size (int): Number of articles per page (default: 5).
        max_pages (int): Maximum number of pages to fetch (default: 1).
        type (str): News type filter, e.g., 'push' for important news (default: 'push').
        lang (str): Language of the news, 'en' for English, 'cn' for Simplified Chinese, 'cht' for Traditional Chinese (default: 'en').

tools.name: get_latest_articles
tools.description:
Fetch the latest blockchain in-depth articles up to max_pages.

    Parameters:
        size (int): Number of articles per page (default: 5).
        max_pages (int): Maximum number of pages to fetch (default: 1).
        type (str): Article type filter, e.g., 'push' for important articles (default: 'push').
        lang (str): Language of the articles, 'en' for English, 'cn' for Simplified Chinese, 'cht' for Traditional Chinese (default: 'en').

server_info_crawled.name: BlockBeats News
server_info_crawled.author: @kukapay/blockbeats-mcp
server_info_crawled.overview: Fetch the latest blockchain news and in-depth articles effortlessly. Stay updated with real-time information and insights tailored for AI agents. Access multi-language support for a broader audience engagement.

server_info_crawled.python_sdk:
import mcp
from mcp.client.streamable_http import streamablehttp_client
import json
import base64

smithery_api_key = ""
url = f"https://server.smithery.ai/@kukapay/blockbeats-mcp/mcp?api_key={smithery_api_key}"

async def main():
    # Connect to the server using HTTP client
    async with streamablehttp_client(url) as (read_stream, write_stream, _):
        async with mcp.ClientSession(read_stream, write_stream) as session:
            # Initialize the connection
            await session.initialize()
            # List available tools
            tools_result = await session.list_tools()
            print(f"Available tools: {', '.join([t.name for t in tools_result.tools])}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import asyncio
    asyncio.run(main())
